rules_text: When this creature enters, target player reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, exile that card and this creature. [i](An exiled Tactic card is shuffled into its owner’s tactic deck.)[/i]
notes:
Type C 

4+

ZZZ

Could be — Target player reveals a card from their hand. Choose one
. That player discards that card
. Look at that player’s hand. You choose a card from their hand other than the revealed card; they discard it

Might need a buff — could cut noncreature or make straight-up deathtouch
Changed since August Optional
